function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence on natural light for pathogen control","Impact":"Increased risk of pathogen transmission in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Implement alternative methods of pathogen control in the absence of natural light","Technologies":"UV-C lights, air purifiers, HEPA filters","People":"Occupants of indoor environments","Owner":"Building managers, policymakers"},{"Description":"Dependence on temperature and humidity for virus transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Implement adjustable controls for temperature and humidity, along with other factors to reduce virus transmission","Technologies":"Smart HVAC systems, air purifiers, ventilation systems","People":"Occupants of indoor environments","Owner":"Building managers, policymakers"},{"Description":"Negative impact on mental health due to prolonged indoor stays","Impact":"Deterioration of mental health among individuals spending prolonged periods indoors","Mitigation":"Increase availability of green spaces and gardens, incorporate indoor plants, and promote outdoor activities","Technologies":"Indoor plant systems, biophilic design, outdoor recreational facilities","People":"Occupants of indoor environments","Owner":"Building managers, mental health professionals"}]}
